external_references.description: Pany, D. & Hanley, C. (2023, May 3). Cloudy with a Chance of Bad Logs: Cloud Platform Log Configurations to Consider in Investigations. Retrieved October 16, 2023.

description: In Office365 environments, consider using PurviewAudit to collect MailItemsAccessed events and monitoring for unusual email access behavior.(Citation: Mandiant Cloudy Logs 2023)
